attributes.action: Instruct HMRC to compensate for the  Lost data files for 14,000+ parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will be compensation for the lost data files containing parents bank details, National Insurance numbers, all personnel records which the government are always telling us to be more aware and secure about - that they lost in the post!! It is recockned due to the Data Protection rules that parents could be rewarded compensation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
